alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 6:02PM CDT until July 10 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OSCEOLA...DICKINSON...NORTHERN CLAY AND SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 602 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Milford, or 7 miles south of Spirit Lake, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Terril around 610 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Superior. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
